Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: FORMED BY HAND; DECORATED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL
Name: Bowl
Description: Hemispherical bowl with an impressed geometrical design on the exterior surface: two bands of parallel diagonal lines impressed below the rim and four radiating panels delineated by small incised lines. The rest of the surface is covered with small impressed lines.
